name: Solace Inc.
description:
We're the #1 time-traveling mercenary company in the galaxy! Got a problem? We'll take care of it! Our state-of-the-art technology allows for fast and reliable solutions to your worries. Anytime, anywhere! Our hundreds of employees are eager to take care of business for you, without headaches or blood on your hands! Give us a call today!



Solace Inc. is a survivors-like where you recruit your employees against endless hordes of enemies. Hack, slash, shoot, and blast away foes with the help of your recruits, and become unstoppable with endless combinations!

Features:
  • 100+ characters to unlock and recruit
  • Unique and challenging missions
  • Upgrades and alternate game modes
  • Charming dialogue from a vast cast of characters
  • Custom character creator
  • Local co-op
  • Cameos from other games and creators
  • ...and more!

Submit your application to Solace Inc. today! We want YOU to fight for us!
